Text: synthetic toll Since you are too weak to show me a bid here is an updated term sheet See you tomorrow morning at am Swank

Draft Term SheetForwarded by Tom SwankHOUECT on AM Reed AECorpCOM Reed Wills on PM To Tom CT cc Subject Draft Term Sheet Please review and lets discuss Monday I am off tomorrow I have a rough consensus on this but I am waiting to circulate it following our discussion Check out the new item on gas imbalance risk and see if it works I did not go to years through but that would help our case Also I tried to quantify the capital I want to have at risk at the end of the year toll Hope this helps you evaluate other alternatives If you have comments tomorrow Ill review them over the weekend and make changes Thanks NOTE We also need to know if you are going to move ahead on Ameren Your comments to date on size make me think Enron is Please let me know asap ENAtermsxls
UAE plant datais a spreadsheet with the operating assumptions for the existing ABB unit Ignore the term and pricing but the perstart charge VOM and HR curves should give you a good starting point T

Re Current work items Cc We have set up an onsite meeting with UAE next Wednesday Mar in Boston Lowell MA actually We will be arriving around noon so an early am flight into Boston would probably work I dont know what your calendar is like but I hope you can fit this meeting in as your inclusion in imperative Also FYI I am going to be with Reed and one of his Fin guys in Bank meeting earlier in the week so we should have some more ideas regarding their options if any in financing structures for the project Regards Tom
synthetic toll Since you are too weak to show me a bid here is an updated term sheet See you tomorrow morning at am Swank
